name: ...we interrupt you with breaking news.
description:
What would happen if cloning humans became a possibility? Narrated entirely through short news broadcasts on the radio. 

Jump over hurtling obstacles at the beach and stay alive long enough to get the full story!

Controls: 

Use Space to jump over incoming obstacles. 

Credits:

This game uses the following assets which are licensed for non-commercial use under the Standard Unity Asset Store EULA:

  • LowPoly Water by Ebru Dogan
  • Modular Fences pack by PolySquid
  • Free Beach Essentials Asset Pack by Ferocious Industries
  • Lowpoly Wasteland Prop by Evgenia  
  • Create with Code - Prototype 3 by Unity Education
  • 8k Skybox Pack by BG Studio

Special thanks to Voice Changer for TTS and sound effects.
